languages.text: {n}Торбальд горделиво улыбается, глядя на роскошное оружие.{/n} "Наш рунный жрец закалил его в крови презренных Несущих Слово, павших на Ефрате-II. Лезвие глазировано костной мукой из зуба фенрисийского кракена, и на нем начертаны имена всех братьев стаи Зловещий вой".

{n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."
languages.original_text: {n}Торбальд горделиво улыбается, глядя на роскошное оружие.{/n} "Наш рунный жрец закалил его в крови презренных Несущих Слово, павших на Ефрате-II. Лезвие глазировано костной мукой из зуба фенрисийского кракена, и на нем начертаны имена всех братьев стаи Зловещий вой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest tempered it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Famehungry pack."

The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Famehungry pack."

{n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest tempered it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Famehungry pack."

{n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest tempered it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

languages.text: {n}Thorbald sonríe, orgulloso, y contempla la magnífica arma.{/n} «Nuestro Sacerdote Rúnico la sació con la sangre de los despreciables Portadores de la Palabra abatidos en Eufrates II. El marfil de la hoja es del diente de un kraken fenrisiano y lleva inscrito los nombres de todos los hermanos de la jauría del Aullido Torvo».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald sonríe, orgulloso, y contempla la magnífica arma.{/n} «Nuestro Sacerdote Rúnico la sació con la sangre de los despreciables Portadores de la Palabra abatidos en Eufrates II. El marfil de la hoja es del diente de un kraken fenrisiano y lleva inscrito los nombres de todos los hermanos de la jauría del Aullido Torvo».

languages.text: {n}索巴德看着这把华丽的斧头，脸上露出了自豪的笑容。{/n}“这把斧头，是我们的符文牧师用欧夫拉茨二号星那个卑劣的怀言者的鲜血淬炼而成的。斧刃上镀了芬里斯海怪牙齿磨成的骨粉，上面还刻着怒嚎者狼群所有兄弟的名字。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德看着这把华丽的斧头，脸上露出了自豪的笑容。{/n}“这把斧头，是我们的符文牧师用欧夫拉茨二号星那个卑劣的怀言者的鲜血淬炼而成的。斧刃上镀了芬里斯海怪牙齿磨成的骨粉，上面还刻着怒嚎者狼群所有兄弟的名字。”
{n}索巴德看着这把华丽的斧头，脸上露出了自豪的笑容。{/n}“这把斧头，是我们的符文牧师用欧夫拉茨二号星那个卑劣的怀言者的鲜血淬炼而成的。斧刃上镀了芬里斯海怪牙齿磨成的骨粉，上面还刻着怒嚎者狼群所有兄弟的名字。”

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは素晴らしい武器を見つめながら、誇らしげに笑う。{/n}「我らがルーンプリーストは、ユーフラテス・IIで倒れた卑劣なワードベアラーの血でそれを強化した。その刃はフェンリスのクラーケンの歯の骨粉でエナメル加工されており、そこには破滅の咆哮全員の名前が刻まれている」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは素晴らしい武器を見つめながら、誇らしげに笑う。{/n}「我らがルーンプリーストは、ユーフラテス・IIで倒れた卑劣なワードベアラーの血でそれを強化した。その刃はフェンリスのクラーケンの歯の骨粉でエナメル加工されており、そこには破滅の咆哮全員の名前が刻まれている」

languages.text: {n}Thorbald affiche un sourire empreint de fierté en embrassant du regard l'arme magnifique.{/n} « Notre prêtre des runes l'a trempée dans le sang impie des Word Bearers tombés sur Euphrate-II. Sa lame est émaillée de cendres d'os issues du croc d'un kraken fenrisien et à sa surface sont gravés les noms de tous les frères de la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald affiche un sourire empreint de fierté en embrassant du regard l'arme magnifique.{/n} « Notre prêtre des runes l'a trempée dans le sang impie des Word Bearers tombés sur Euphrate-II. Sa lame est émaillée de cendres d'os issues du croc d'un kraken fenrisien et à sa surface sont gravés les noms de tous les frères de la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires. »

languages.text: {n}Thorbald blickt stolz grinsend auf die prachtvolle Waffe.{/n} "Unser Runenpriester hat sie im Blut der widerwärtigen Word Bearer gebadet, die auf Eufrates II gefallen sind. Die Klinge ist mit Knochenmehl aus dem Zahn eines fenrisischen Kraken überzogen, und die Namen aller Bruder des Baleful-Howl-Rudels sind darin eingraviert."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald blickt stolz grinsend auf die prachtvolle Waffe.{/n} "Unser Runenpriester hat sie im Blut der widerwärtigen Wortträger gebadet, die auf Eufrates II gefallen sind. Die Klinge ist mit Knochenmehl aus dem Zahn eines fenrisischen Kraken überzogen, und die Namen aller Bruder des Baleful-Howl-Rudels sind darin eingraviert."

{n}Thorbald blickt stolz grinsend auf die prachtvolle Waffe.{/n} "Unser Runenpriester hat sie im Blut der widerwärtigen Word Bearers gebadet, die auf Eufrates II gefallen sind. Die Klinge ist mit Knochenmehl aus dem Zahn eines fenrisischen Kraken überzogen, und die Namen aller Bruder des Baleful-Howl-Rudels sind darin eingraviert."

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, muhteşem baltaya bakarken gururla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Rün Rahibi, bunu Eufrates II'de düşen namert Vahyedenlerin kanıyla suladı. Baltanın bıçağı, Fenris krakeninin dişinden elde edilen kemik minesiyle sırlandı ve üzerine Uğursuz Uluma sürüsündeki tüm kardeşlerin adı kazındı."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald grins with pride as he looks upon the magnificent weapon.{/n} "Our Rune Priest quenched it in the blood of the despicable Word Bearers who fell on Eufrates II. The blade is enamelled with bonemeal from the tooth of a Fenrisian kraken, and inscribed on it are the names of all the brothers of the Baleful Howl pack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Harika baltaya bakan Thorbald, gururla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Rün Rahibi, bunu Eufrates II'de düşen namert Vahyedenler'in kanıyla suladı. Bıçak, Fenris krakeninin dişinden elde edilen materyallerle sırlandı ve üzerine Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünün tüm kardeşlerinin adı yazıldı."
